etymology.description: Depicts a single step with a foot slightly raised
etymology.interpretation: 亍(亍) (chù, 'step') is a simple pictogram representing a small step, showing a minimal depiction of movement or the positioning of a foot.

examples.chinese: 他一亍一亍地向山顶走去(他一亍一亍地向山頂走去)。
examples.pinyin: Tā yī chù yī chù de xiàng shāndǐng zǒuqù.
examples.english: He stepped steadily, one step after another, toward the mountaintop.

examples.chinese: 行人走过古道时(行人走過古道時)，每一亍都留下岁月痕迹(每一亍都留下歲月痕跡)。
examples.pinyin: Xíngrén zǒuguò gǔdào shí, měi yī chù dōu liúxià suìyuè hénjì.
examples.english: When pedestrians traverse the ancient path, each step leaves the mark of time.

examples.chinese: 旅者登山时(旅者登山時)，谨记每一亍的重要性(謹記每一亍的重要性)。
examples.pinyin: Lǚzhě dēngshān shí, jǐnjì měi yī chù de zhòngyàoxìng.
examples.english: When the traveler climbs the mountain, he remembers the importance of every single step.
